system.description:
By succeeding in an Ability check (Intelligence + Font of Knowledge + stress die) against an Ease Factor of (6 plus (3 times number of uses of Font of Knowledge that day)) a creature with this Ability may attempt a task with any untrained ability as if they possessed a score of 2. Failed attempts count towards the number of uses in a given day.

Specialties: a particular topic. (Supernatural)
